title: One step at a time (TEFC): introduction to behavior modification
brief_description: Dr Roger Ulrich explains how positive reinforcement in behaviour modification works. He shows how praise, warm physical contact, tokens, charts and graphs, and other rewards encourage handicapped children or disturbed adults to respond with appropriate behaviour.
